Define Documentation

#define BW_USE_RDTSC

Function Documentation

uint64 stampsPerSecond (  ) 

This function returns the processor's (real-time) clock cycle counter.

It caches its reply after being called for the first time, however that call may take some time.

uint64 stampsPerSecond_gettimeofday (  ) 

uint64 stampsPerSecond_rdtsc (  ) 

double stampsPerSecondD (  ) 

This function tells you how many there are in a second as a double precision floating point value.

It caches its reply after being called for the first time, however that call may take some time.
